data.title: Bigg Boss 11: Hina Khan BLASTS Hiten Tejwani, Drags Wife Gauri Pradhan In The Argument
data.meta_description: Aggressive Hina Khan gets into a war of words with Mr. Cool Hiten Tejwani and amidst the fight, drags his wife Gauri Pradhan as well. The situation gets quite out of hand. We bring you this update FIRST, with details... | Read at SpotboyE
data.text:
Hina Khan is back with a bang. This time it’s Hiten Tejwani on her radar. Catch this update FIRST on SpotboyE.com.

During a task, Hina and Hiten got into an argument as she blamed the latter of blindly following Vikas Gupta.

While fights and drama are a part and parcel of this show, what grabbed our attention was that Hina dragged Hiten’s beloved wife, Gauri’s name in the ugly spat.

Hiten Tejwani Poses With Wife Gauri Pradhan

In the video, you can see Hina screaming her lungs out and saying, “Bahut sahi likha hai iski wife ne-Don’t be a follower, be a leader.”

Well, we don’t know if Hiten reacted to Hina’s statement. But why get personal and drag those who aren’t even a part of the show, Hina?

A Still From The Task

In the other parts of the episode, we also see Priyank and Luv get into an argument, where Hina is seen pacifying both, however, the two hot-blooded boys walk out on each other during the fight.

Bigg Boss 11 is turning out to be one of the most talked-about shows and this season is surely one of the most controversial one. A few hours back, we told you that Priyank Sharma can be in a big trouble as the channel has decided to send his ex-girlfriend, Divya Aggarwal inside the house in a family task. Along with her, Hina Khan’s boyfriend, Rocky Jaiswal, Shilpa Shinde’s brother Ashutosh Shinde and Vikas Gupta’s brother, Siddharth Gupta will also enter the house.

A Still From The Day Care Task In Bigg Boss 11

Well, looks like the coming days in the Bigg Boss house are going to be super entertaining.

Image Source: twitter/colorstv, instagram/radhica23, instagram/hitentejwani & instagram/gauripradhan
